thread.title: 4th ODI is one game we played well in all departments: MS Dhoni
thread.title_full: 4th ODI is one game we played well in all departments: MS Dhoni - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: 4th ODI is one game we played well in all departments: MS Dhoni
text:
*Chennai:* Praising centurion Virat Kohli for his superb batting in the side's series-levelling win against South Africa, Indian skipper Mahendra Singh Dhoni yesterday said that it was the first game in which his team did well in all the three departments.
*MS Dhoni. Pic/AFP*
Electing to bat, India rode on Kohli's brilliant ... Â»
